attributes.action: Deal with getting people at Luton Airport through Passport Control quicker and Efficently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This goes out to everyone who has travelled through Luton Airport Passport control when returning to this country.

I like thousands of others became sheep huddled, while Police just stood by, and with only Two passport control officers on duty late at night we were subjected to not only Hot air blowing through vents but cold air blowing at different vents, we suffered badly, and had to wait over an hour to get through to collect our luugage which was left on the floor unattended, this is unacceptable behaviour and request more passport control officers, and people watching the luggage making sure no one tampers with baggage.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
